de.desy.language.snl.ui.adapter
Class SNLNodeAdapterFactory

java.lang.Object
  de.desy.language.snl.ui.adapter.SNLNodeAdapterFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAdapterFactory
public class SNLNodeAdapterFactory
extends Object
implements IAdapterFactory

This class generate IWorkbenchAdapter for AbstractSNLNodes. If a special IAdapterFactory is registered for a specific type of an AbstractSNLNode, that factory is used.

C1 WPS / KM
